module.name: assembly_module_usage_view
module.keywords: module, assembly, electrical, electronic, electromechanical, design, usage, network analysis, hierarchy, terminals

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the electronic assembly for use as a component at the next level of assembly. The level of information provided is for use of the electronic assembly by a design organization and not manufacture. Shape properties may be provided.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Functional assignment to part, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1674;
items within the scope of application module Network functional usage view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1705;
items within the scope of application module Packaged connector model, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1708.
